title: Which champion should I save up for? Lulu or Lissandra?
body: I like playing supports or mages. I want to know your opinions on who is funner and has a better move set then each other? {{champion:127}} **VS** {{champion:117}}

replies.body: Lulu is a utility mage, Lissandra is a Burst Mage. Lulu is OK atm but isnt the best support right now, she is also not the best mage right now either but can be a good counter to some melee mid laners (fizz, Zed)

> [{quoted}](name=TerenceMckenna2g,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=oiIAgZbO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-13T20:31:27.331+0000)
>
> Lulu is a utility mage, Lissandra is a Burst Mage. Lulu is OK atm but isnt the best support right now, she is also not the best mage right now either but can be a good counter to some melee mid laners (fizz, Zed)

They're actually both 'utility' mages, Lulu being the more viable pick as of this moment.

If I had to pick between the two, I would pick Lulu, no doubt.
If you're soloqueuing, Lulu will work for top/mid and support.
Lissandra is sort of one of those champs where you want to play her mid, anywhere else and it's a pretty risky pick ( depending on your team composition ).

Lulu is a support style mage. Lissandra is more just a mage, like Ziggs. Waveclear, usefull Ult, etc.

Lulu wins the game by providing CC, Health, Shields and doing a little bit of damage with her Q. Don't get me wrong, a fed solo lane Lulu can 2 hit an ADC with a Q+E late game but she can also be usefull even if she falls behind.

Lissandra with a Zhonyas can be almost unkillable and 1v5 under the right circumstances.

Both champions have completely different play styles. If I was to pick one out of the two, I would pick Lissandra, as she appeals to my play style more. She has quick burst and good mobility, by which I mean it is easy to get around with her E. To be honest, I haven't played Lulu so I wouldn't know much about her, but if you want a Strong Mage who can hold their own in lane and deliver quick bursts of damage, go with Lissandra =).
